full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA DAR 'BREL BAR RIGS GSUM MGON PO'I BZLAS BRJOD BYED TSUL BYIN RLABS GTER CHEN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A*, ,(CES DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA'I 'JUG TU 'DON RGYU'I 'DOD GSOL SMON LAM 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES DKA' BCU BLO BZANG RIN CHEN DANG, CHOS MDZAD 'JAM DBYANGS DBANG PHYUG DANG, SKYOR DPON RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG SBYIN PA DANG, DRUNG YIG PA DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS PHUN TSOGS DANG, DGE TSUL NAM MKHA' DON GRUB RNAMS KYIS NAN TAN CHEN POS GSOL BA BTAB PA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG ZHVA SER @009B COD PAn 'DZIN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO YE SHES BRTZON GRUS GRAGS PA'I SDE CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL SU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO DRUNG YIG PA DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS PHUN TSOGS SO, ,LEGS SO, 'JIG RTEN BDE LEGS CHEN POS KHYAB PA DANG, RGYAL BSTAN PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS PAR SHOG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO YE SHES BRTZON GRUS,
